name: Violet The Robot
description:
Violet The Robot

Violet is forced to assemble robots as the war caves in. You start with a set of parts, such as a head, body, arms, and legs. The goal of the game is to have fun and create this robot- Or is there  more?

My First Jam Game!

Hii! This is my first ever game jam game! idk if it is game but it is something. I made this in 3 days hopefully I can join and finish other jams in the future

JAM

PROCJAM 2022
